meanings.definition: Activity requiring physical effort, carried out to sustain or improve health and fitness.
meanings.sent1: Regular exercise is important for staying healthy and fit.
meanings.sent2: She does her daily exercises to keep in shape.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful exercise with a ball of yarn was entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to exercise was like a well-oiled machine, always in motion.
meanings.sent5: The exercise of jogging in the park made her feel alive and invigorated.

meanings.definition: A task set to practice or test a skill.
meanings.sent1: The math exercise was challenging but helped improve his problem-solving abilities.
meanings.sent2: Completing the writing exercise improved her storytelling skills.
meanings.sent3: The exercise of untangling knots in a rope was surprisingly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: His daily piano exercises were like musical puzzles waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The exercise of painting landscapes broadened her artistic talents.

meanings.definition: To engage in physical activity to sustain or improve health and fitness.
meanings.sent1: She loves to exercise by going for a run every morning.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend that you exercise regularly to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: He decided to exercise by dancing in his living room to his favorite music.
meanings.sent4: The trees outside seemed to exercise in the wind, bending and swaying gracefully.
meanings.sent5: Exercising in the fresh air always lifts her spirits and energizes her.

meanings.definition: To use or apply a skill or activity.
meanings.sent1: He needed to exercise caution when handling the fragile glassware.
meanings.sent2: She had to exercise her negotiation skills to reach a compromise.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to exercise precision while decorating the cake with icing.
meanings.sent4: The author would exercise creativity when crafting new stories.
meanings.sent5: She would often exercise her patience when teaching young children.
